explains: adj. 有同情心的，怜悯的

sentences.en: She has a wise, compassionate face.
sentences.cn: 她有一张智慧和同情的脸。

sentences.en: One could tell at a glance that she was a compassionate person.
sentences.cn: 一眼就能看出她是一个富有同情心的人。

sentences.en: These charities depend on the compassionate feelings and generosity of the general public.
sentences.cn: 这些慈善机构依赖于公众的同情和慷慨。
